column2: Babson College, F.W. Olin Graduate School of Business (Babson / Olin)
column3: Located in Wellesley, MA, near Boston. Renowned for #1 MBA in entrepreneurship (U.S. News, 30+ years). Offers one-year and two-year full-time MBA programs, plus part-time and blended learning options. Features Entrepreneurial Thought & Action® methodology, emphasizing practical training, market analysis, and social responsibility. Curriculum includes 45 credits (15 core, 30 electives) and real-world projects like Babson Consulting Alliance.
column12: R1: Oct 21, 2024; R2: Jan 13, 2025; R3: Mar 27, 2025; R4: May 7, 2025; R5: Jun 1, 2025; Rolling thereafter
column15: 85% international, 33% women, 38% domestic students of color. Avg work exp: 6 years. Avg GMAT: 601, Avg GPA: 3.29.
